articles.description: Can weight loss drugs cause muscle loss? Any significant weight loss can impact lean body mass, but it's not necessarily harmful.
articles.content:
Weight loss drugs have soared in popularity in the past year, helping some lose dramatic amounts of weight but not all that weight is fat.
Some of that is actually lean mass, which is everything in … [+7125 chars]
